code: import path from"path";import fs from"fs";export function getImagesInFolder(folder){var build_path=path.join(__dirname,'..','build');var images_dir=path.join(build_path,'images',folder);var images=fs.readdirSync(images_dir).filter(function(file){return file.endsWith('.png');}).map(function(file){return path.join('images',folder,file);});return images;}
